original_text:
He has performed mighty deeds with his arm;
    he has scattered those who are proud in their inmost thoughts.
korean_text: 그의 팔로 힘을 보이사 마음의 생각이 교만한 자들을 흩으셨고

sentences.original_text: He has performed mighty deeds with his arm
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 팔로 강력한 일을 행하셨다

sentences.original_text: he has scattered those who are proud
